snippet.title: Swift: Audible - How to Build a Login Guide (Ep 1)
snippet.description:
Welcome to a brand new mini-series on how to build a Walkthrough / Onboarding / Login component.  In this short series of videos, I'll guide you through how to use a UICollectionView to page through several screens of content.  Make sure to download the source code below for some of the helper functions that I use in the video.  Hope you enjoy and follow along for the next couple of videos.

Completed Source Code
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Audible-Login-Walkthrough

Want to learn more about iOS Development? Here are a few additional playlist resources on my channel:

Lets Build AppStore series: 
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JEXct3-OV6itP7Kz3tRDmma

Lets Build Facebook Feed series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JHDWIO3x4wePhD8G4d1Fa6N

Lets Build Facebook Messenger series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JHGoEg41IJNk9QQ_hPWcyRo

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/buildthatapp
